name: Facility 3B
description:
Facility 3B is a in-development horror game about a place called Facility 3B

You lost your job.
You see an for a research facility.
You apply and get accepted.
When you arrive something seems shady.
Nobody is there to welcome you.
You find a note telling you to go to Facility 3B.

Things go terribly wrong......

Explore an abandon laboratory.

Uncover dark secrets.

Survive a wasteland.
